mapper.select: SELECT pst.id ,pst.subject ,DATE_FORMAT(pst.updated_datetime, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") AS updated_datetime ,usr.user_name ,pst.hit FROM posts pst ,user usr WHERE 1 = 1 AND pst.updated_user_id = usr.user_id ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts ( parent_id, depth, board_id , subject, content , created_datetime, created_user_id , updated_datetime, updated_user_id , hit, `delete` ) VALUES ( 0, 0, 1 , #{subject}, #{content} , NOW(), (SELECT user_id FROM user WHERE user_name = #{writer}) , NOW(), (SELECT user_id FROM user WHERE user_name = #{writer}) , 0, 0 )
